mapper.select: select imei, phone, count, day, android_id as androidId, mac_address as macAddress from ml_imei_phone_log u where u.imei = #{imei} and u.android_id=#{androidId} and u.mac_address=#{macAddress}" ;
mapper.insert: insert ignore into ml_imei_phone_log(imei, phone, count, day, android_id, mac_address) values(#{imei}, #{phone} ,0, #{day}, #{androidId}, #{macAddress}) ;
mapper.update: update ml_imei_phone_log set count = 0, day = #{day}, phone = #{phone} where imei = #{imei} and android_id=#{androidId} and mac_address=#{macAddress};
update ml_imei_phone_log set count = count + 1, phone = #{phone} where imei = #{imei} and android_id=#{androidId} and mac_address=#{macAddress} ;
